about_the_game:
Congratulations, graduate!
You got hired right out of veterinary medicine school. Your new employer recognized your talent and love for animals right away. They chose you to help them launch their brand-new vet clinic! Show them everything you’ve learned while helping raise the clinic’s reputation. Save animal’s lives by treating numerous complex scenarios. Identify unknown injuries and wow new customers with your stellar animal care. In your downtime, feel free to play fetch with the clinic’s mischievous mascot, Bruce. No need to be nervous! If you forget how to do anything, the boss will be more than happy to go over all veterinary fundamentals with you.

In VetVR, your main goal is to save animal lives and increase the reputation of your brand new veterinary clinic. Evaluate emergency situations and make medical decisions that will affect the animal patient in real time. Treat everything from minor wounds to mysterious injuries that will require logic and veterinary knowledge to solve with the use of drugs. Experience the real life fun of being a veterinarian and remember to spend some time between cases playing with the animal patients in the lobby.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 400 Series equivalent or higher
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: VR Headset and Controllers
  • Additional Notes: VR ONLY
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700k/ AMD equivalent or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080/ AMD equivalent or higher
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: VR Headset and Controllers
  • Additional Notes: VR ONLY

short_description: As a brand-new veterinary graduate, you'll find yourself tasked with the responsibility of saving animals' lives while striving to increase your clinic's reputation. Learn as you play through realistic veterinary training and solve animal emergencies. Find easter eggs and play fetch in the lobby.
